multiblock.error.biggerreactors.no_termi: 反應堆需要至少一個終端
multiblock.error.biggerreactors.no_rods: 反應堆至少要有一個燃料元件
multiblock.error.biggerreactors.control_: 控制桿只能放在反應堆上方(%d， %d， %d)
multiblock.error.biggerreactors.fuel_rod: 所有燃料元件必須從反應堆上方延伸至其底部(%d， %d， %d)
multiblock.error.biggerreactors.no_contr: 所有的燃料元件必須用控制桿控制(%d， %d)
multiblock.error.biggerreactors.dangling: 這裡面似乎還有一個反應堆，是不是出了什麼問題？(%d， %d， %d)
multiblock.error.biggerreactors.coolant_: 反應堆只能有冷卻埠（主動冷卻型）或電源接頭（被動冷卻型），兩者不可兼得。
multiblock.error.biggerreactors.no_manif: 反應堆冷卻劑歧管必須與另一個歧管或外殼相鄰

screen.biggerreactors.reactor_control_ro:
收回桿
§7減少插入增加反應速度
§8[Shift]: 收回10%.
§8[Ctrl]: 收回50%.
§8[Ctrl + Shift]: 最大收回量.
§8[Alt]: 應用到全部桿.

插入桿
§7插入越多減少反應速度
§8[Shift]: 插入10%.
§8[Ctrl]: 插入50%.
§8[Ctrl + Shift]: 最大插入量.
§8[Alt]: 應用到全部桿.

screen.biggerreactors.reactor_redstone_p:
Change Reactor Status (Input)
§8[On Pulse] Toggle whether the reactor is on or off.
§8[On Signal] When redstone is applied, the reactor is active.

Change Control Rod Insertion (Input)
§8[On Pulse] Move the control rod, depending on the current mode.
§8[On Signal] Set the insertion level depending on whether redstone is applied.

排出廢物（輸入）
§8[脈衝] 從反應堆排出所有廢物。
§8[訊號] N/A。

燃料溫度（輸出）
§8[當高於/低於] 當燃料溫度高於或低於設定溫度觸發。

外殼溫度（輸出）
§8[當高於/低於] 當燃料溫度高於或低於設定溫度時觸發。

Fuel Enrichment (Output)
§8[While Above/Below] Trigger when the fuel enrichment level is above or below the set percentage.

Fuel Amount (Output)
§8[While Above/Below] Trigger when the fuel level is above or below the set amount.

Waste Amount (Output)
§8[While Above/Below] Trigger when the waste level is above or below the set amount.

Output Stored (Output)
§8[While Above/Below] Trigger when the output stored is above or below the set amount.

Apply Changes
§7Your changes will not take affect until applied.

§4[UNIMPLEMENTED]
Revert Changes
§7Reset current changes to those last applied.

Toggle Trigger
§7Toggle the trigger type.
§8[On Pulse] Toggle state when redstone is pulsed. 
§8[On Signal] Active only when provided with a redstone signal.

Toggle Trigger
§7Toggle the trigger type.
§8[While Above/Below] Output a signal when above or below...

Toggle Mode
§7Toggle trigger mode.
§8[Mode A] Insert by...
§8[Mode B] Retract by...
§8[Mode C] Set to...
Blades and coils cannot exist at the same rotor shaft position
Only one blade pack and one coil pack may exist at a time
All coil blocks must be in the 8 blocks closest to the turbine shaft
Turbines require exactly 2 rotor bearings, one at each end
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.t:
Tachometer
§7How fast the turbine is spinning.
§7Rotors perform best at 900 or 1800 RPM.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.e:
RF Generation Rate
§7How much RF the turbine is generating.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.f:
Flow Rate Governor
§7How fast the turbine will process fluids.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.r:
Rotor Efficiency
§7Efficiency drops if flow rate is over rotor capacity.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.i:
Internal Battery
§7How much RF is stored internally.

Intake Tank
§7How much hot intake is stored internally.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.e:
Exhaust Tank
§7How much cold exhaust is stored internally.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.a:
Toggle Reactor Status
§7Turn the reactor on or off.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.c:
Toggle Coil Engagement
§7When engaged, turbine rotor speed will be converted into electricity.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.v:
Toggle Exhaust Venting
§7Set how or whether exhaust will be vented.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_terminal.f:
Increase Flow Rate
§7Higher flow rates increase rotor speed.
§8[Shift]: Increase by 10 mB.
§8[Ctrl]: Increase by 50 mB.
§8[Ctrl + Shift]: Increase by 100 mB.

Decrease Flow Rate
§7Lower flow rates decrease rotor speed.
§8[Shift]: Decrease by 10 mB.
§8[Ctrl]: Decrease by 50 mB.
§8[Ctrl + Shift]: Decrease by 100 mB.
screen.biggerreactors.turbine_coolant_po:
Toggle Direction
§7Change which direction this port flows.
screen.biggerreactors.heat_exchanger_ter:
Condenser Channel Temperature
§7How hot the fluid in the condenser
§7channels is.

Evaporator Channel Temperature
§7How hot the fluid in the evaporator
§7channels is.

Condenser Flow Rate
§7How much fluid is flowing through
§7the condenser channels.

Evaporator Flow Rate
§7How much fluid is flowing through
§7the evaporator channels.

Condenser Intake Tank
§7How much hot fluid is in
§7the condenser channels.

Condenser Exhaust Tank
§7How much cold fluid is in
§7the condenser channels.

Heat Exchanger Temperature
§7How hot the exchanger is.

Evaporator Intake Tank
§7How much cold fluid is in
§7the evaporator channels.

Evaporator Exhaust Tank
§7How much hot fluid is in
§7the evaporator channels.
multiblock.error.biggerreactors.heat_exc: There appears to be another heat exchanger inside this one, is something wrong? (%d, %d, %d).
All channels must be connected to a coolant port. (%d, %d, %d)
Both the evaporator and condenser must connect to two coolant ports.
所有冷卻埠必須有一個連接的通道。
確切的需要 4 個冷卻劑埠。
At least one evaporator and one condenser channel are required.
